p: Both original strain and mutant strains were preserved in slant medium containing (g/L): Potato Dextrose Agar (BD Difco, Sparks, MD, America) 39.0, mulberry powder 10.0; The seed culture was conducted in a 250 mL flask for 7 days at 28 Â°C containing100 mL liquid medium (g/L): Potato Dextrose Broth (BD Difco, America) 24.0, mulberry powder 10.0; Fermentation medium (g/L): KH 2PO 4 1.0, MgSO 4 1.0, yeast autolytic powder 10.0 and glucose 20.0 and mulberry powder 10.0. The submerged culture was performed with three duplicate parallel samples in 1 L flask for 5 days with 10% ( v/ v) seed culture. The mycelia from three parallel samples were collected and freeze-dried, respectively. The dry weights of three parallel mycelia samples were accurately weighed for determining biomass production and polysaccharide contents.
